features: SMART DESIGN AND LOST OF ROOM: Molle Medical pouch with outside pocket, inside mesh pocket and multiple elastic straps are good for storing medical supplies.

QUICK RELEASE BACK PANEL DESIGN: Tactical EMT pouch is designed to be rip-away from the modular platform when needed, and the strap on the platform keeps it from falling off accidentally. Wide handle for carrying or rapid removal.

MATERIAL: First aid pouch is meant to last for years and provide anti-scraping and wear-resisting to protect your tactical accessories. Constructed with high-density 1000D polyester, double stitched for durability.
STAY HOOKED UP ALL DAY： MOLLE compatible PALS and tough nylon snap-straps fully secure medical pouch to belt, pack, chest rig, truck seat back and EDC backpack.
RED CROSS PATCH INCLUDED: 2 inches patch area across front of pouch for a First Aid Patch. Size: 7.1" * 5.5" * 2.4"(L*H*W). We offer 30days money-back of quality guarantee.
body.description: MOLLE SYSTEMMOLLE style attachment straps give a lot of variety to clip on other items like belt, vest, backpack, platform, etc.RAPID REMOVALRip Away velcro panel feature and a wide handle for rapid removal makes it a snap to render first aid quickly.LOTS OF ROOMYou can add some medic supplies to the individual pouches as a first aid emt pouch to suit your needs and they work well in this bag.Specification:Size: 7.1"*5.5"*2.4" / 19*17*8 cmMaterial: 1000D Nylon FabricPatch Size: 2"*2" / 5*5cmPackage included:Molle Medical Pouch * 1Red Cross Patch * 1Notes:Keep the pouch dry and clean for durable use.If there were any questions. Please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure, durable and good size.
reviews.reviewText: I have two. One on a 2 row molle belt and one on a cummerbund belt. Fits well on both. Rip away feature is great. Seems pretty quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the straps so I can attach it to my fishing waist bag just incase of emergencies, it would not be the first time someone got hooked and when I am not using it for fishing, I leave it in my glove box compartment in my vehicle.Overall I love the product, especially since it’s not so large and doesn’t take up much space. Perfect for what I need it for 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good pouch for a ed kit
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this pouch to house my med kit that I keep on my battle belt. Overall the pouch is a good size and seems fairly sturdy. I bought a pre-built med kit to put in here and everything fit, but it was a little tight. The only thing I don't like about the kit is how the straps on the bottom hold the tourniquet. There really isn't anything securing it, the straps just kind of go over top of it. I wouldn't trust it to keep the tourniquet in place. Aside from that, the pouch is good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly sized IFAK
reviews.reviewText: Great little IFAK, stuffed to capacity with only essential life saving equipment and fits in my bag as part of my EDC. If you are looking for an IFAK that you can keep on your belt, in your bag, or vehicle, then look no further! Dont get me wrong, this item wont be the solution for everyone but the quality isn't bad too for the price and fulfills it's intended purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good product
reviews.reviewText: The velcro is good on the tearaway and the patch, I zipper is strong and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good IFAK Pouch
reviews.reviewText: The pouch is sturdy and well constructed. It is the perfect size to hold all the first aid supplies needed and small enough as not to be in the way while it is attached to my gun belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great size. Tq loop is too small. Very solid pouch
reviews.reviewText: 1st: I am no expert in any way, doubly so when it comes to IFAK/CLS topics.TLDR=Over all I think it's better than the price suggests. I'm not disappointed nor pleasantly surprised. Would recommendDetails:-The pouch seems to be built well enough to be used as intended.-The material and stitching are good but not " fine work".- It's big enough inside to fit all the items pictured below (basic IFAC with some extras) with a little extra room as to keep the contents from being damaged by being crammed in.-The retention strap doesn't really tighten down as much as removes it's own slack.-The loop on the bottom that is implied to be used as a TQ holder is too small to be used as such and is not stretchy.-the "handle" used to pull pouch off of the carrier doest really fold out of the way, it will likely snag on stuff. I was able to roll it and tuck it slightly between the pouch and carrier, but with heightened activity it will come out and snag. (I will likely modify the handle)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly as described
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as it's supposed to. Great description.
